title: Why does Chrome display a different tab's content when I click on a text box to type?
content:
Often when I press/click on a text entry box on webpages (e.g. PhpBB forums) in a Chrome tab, the keyboard pops up, and the contents of a different tab appear. This prevents me selecting text or the cursor position. However, when I type, the display reverts back to the correct tab. Clicking again will switch the tab display again.

See the screenshot for an example: compare the URL bar to the screen.

This has persisted through reboots and the update from Android 10 to 11.
